Package com.group26.node.packet.formats

Interface NetworkPacket

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataAckPacket, DataPacket, IssueAddressPacket, LinkStateRequest, LinkStateUpdate, PingPongPacket, RequestAddressPacket, SessionUpdate
    public interface NetworkPacket
    Packet that is used for the communication between the nodes in the network.
